title: Biden Rules Out Unilateral Force if Russia Invades Ukraine
sub_head: Day after video talk with U.S. president, Russia’s leader Putin doesn’t rule out invasion
body:
President Biden ruled out a unilateral use of U.S. force if Russia invades Ukraine, and said he hoped to convene meetings between Russia and NATO allies soon.
And in Moscow Wednesday, Russian President Vladimir Putin said he was responding to a creeping threat from NATO and didn’t rule out an invasion.
